Entries.breakUp: Wait... what?!$8#$b#I thought we were doing okay... I guess I was way off... alright, then.$9#$b#Yeah, sure... we can just be casual friends.$9
Entries.divorced: I'm sorry, @. I don't think I can go back to being 'regular' friends.$s
Entries.Wed6: I've been friends with Sebastian for a while. He's a pretty cool guy.#$e#If you two and Abby weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.
Entries.Wed10: Hey, you look like you're full of energy today!
Entries.Fri10: The older I get the more attached I feel to the valley.#$b#Although that could just be because my best friend is here.$10#$e#So, how are you doing today?$h
Entries.fall_Fri10: I think I've grown to like the country more than the city.$h#$b#Although that could just be because my best friend is here.$10#$e#So, how are you doing today?$h
Entries.NPC.cs.3980: !!! Seriously? You and me, {{RelationshipLabel}}?$8#$b#No way! I mean, yes way! This is so cool!$10#$b#In the valley, we celebrate pacts like this the same way as weddings. I'll set everything up. We'll have the commitment ceremony in 3 days, okay?
Entries.NPC.cs.3962: You want us to hang out more? Sweet!$h#$e#Hey, do you play any instruments? ...Hmm, a mini-harp might not work with the band's sound.
Entries.NPC.cs.3963: Wow! You got me all these fancy flowers just to say you want to be better friends?#$e#I'm totally on board. But next time, how about a 'friendship pizza'?$h
Entries.NPC.cs.3985: I heard you gave {0} a gift today.#$e#That was seriously cool of you!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4001: A fan tossed that fruit onstage at one of my old band's gigs. I could tell it was something special, so I've been saving it ever since.#$b#I gave it to you because... I wanted to help out, I guess.$h#$b#Even if it's just by giving you the energy to do even more of the work around here... heh.$10#$b#Seriously, though... I know I don't always step up when it comes to that stuff. I still have a lot of bad habits to break.$s#$b#But I'll tell you one thing you can count on from me. I'll be by your side for the rest of our lives.#$b#I think for my dad, being responsible for our family meant fighting for us... even if he had leave us to do it.$s#$b#I'm still figuring out what responsibility means to me, but I think it starts with just... being here. And that's exactly what I'm gonna do.$u#$b#I love you, @. I love the little family we've made together. I'm not going anywhere.$l
Entries.NPC.cs.4425: Life sure is different since we've been {{RelationshipLabel}}...$s
Entries.Event.cs.1736: $q -1 null#Uh oh...#$r -1 0 danceAsk#(Ask Sam to be your dance partner)#$r -1 0 null#Nevermind...

Entries.NPC.cs.4442: I feel sick this morning...I think I'm just nervous. I hope I did the adoption paperwork right.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4446: I just feel like sleeping today. I was up late looking for deals on toys and baby clothes...$s#$b#I hope the adoption agency gets back to us soon.$7
Entries.NPC.cs.4443: I'm tired... can't you make your own breakfast?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4444: {{TermofEndearment}}, wow... You and me, adopting a baby... $l#$b#I'm going to give them the best childhood anyone's ever had. I'll be by their side every step of the way.$u
Entries.NPC.cs.4447: {{TermofEndearment}}, wow... You and me, adopting a baby... $l#$b#I'm going to give them the best childhood anyone's ever had. I'll be by their side every step of the way.$u
Entries.NPC.cs.4445: {{TermofEndearment}}, I'm stoked about the adoption. I feel like I'm meant to be a dad.$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4448: {{TermofEndearment}}, I'm stoked about the adoption. I feel like I'm meant to be a dad.$h

Entries.fall_12: $1 JodiBirthday#Hey, my mom's birthday surprise went really well. She about cried when she realized I cooked the eggs myself! Thanks again for your help, @.$h#$e#Yesterday was my mom's birthday. I try to make those special for her every year now.

$1 JodiBirthday#Sam did the sweetest thing for my birthday yesterday... He brought me breakfast in bed! Don't tell him, but until then I wasn't sure he knew how to work the stove.$h#$e#These days, I look forward to my birthdays more than I used to. Sam really goes the extra mile.

Entries.Sam: $1 JodiBirthday#Hey, my mom's birthday surprise went really well. She about cried when she realized I cooked the eggs myself! Thanks again for your help, @.$h#$e#Yesterday was my mom's birthday. I try to make those special for her every year now.
Entries.Jodi: $1 JodiBirthday#Sam did the sweetest thing for my birthday yesterday... He brought me breakfast in bed! Don't tell him, but until then I wasn't sure he knew how to work the stove.$h#$e#These days, I look forward to my birthdays more than I used to. Sam really goes the extra mile.

Entries.fall_12: $1 JodiBirthday#Yesterday was Mom's birthday. Sam made a big mess in the kitchen, but he cleaned it up before she saw.#$e#Sam let me help with Mom's birthday breakfast yesterday! I got eggs all over me.$h
My wife's birthday was yesterday. Seeing Sam go out of his way for her made me feel slightly better about how many of those I've missed.

Entries.Sam0: I'm really happy we're going to be {{RelationshipLabel}}, @.$l#$e#I'm excited.$h
Entries.Sam1: I never dreamed this would happen. I'm so lucky.$l#$e#I can't wait for the ceremony. Which reminds me, I still need to plan out all the music!$8

Entries.Sam0: I'm really happy we're going to be {{RelationshipLabel}}, @.#$e#I'm excited.$h
Entries.Sam1: I never dreamed this would happen. I'm so lucky.#$e#I can't wait for the ceremony. Which reminds me, I still need to plan out all the music!$8

Entries.NPC.cs.3965: Huh? I don't get it. You already gave me one of those.$7
Entries.NPC.cs.3966: Do you think these pendants would make a cool sound if I tapped them together? ...Yeah, that's probably a bad idea.$10
Entries.NPC.cs.3967: Aww, c'mon. I know I lose things... like, a lot... but I never take my pendant off! You didn't need to buy a spare.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.3968: I don't think I should wear two pendants. They'd clink together when I do kickflips.

Entries.NPC.cs.3965: ...Is this a comment on my parenting style? I know I've babied Sam a little, but do you really think I'd try to follow him to your house?$3
Entries.NPC.cs.3966: Um... I already have a house. I might even get to sleep in the biggest bedroom once I clear Sam's things out of it...$4
Entries.NPC.cs.3967: ...Is this a comment on my parenting style? I know I used to baby Sam a little, but do you really think I'd try to follow him to your house?$3
Entries.NPC.cs.3968: Um... I already have a house. I might even get to sleep in the biggest bedroom, if I ever get around to clearing Sam's things out of it...$4

Entries.NPC.cs.3965: ...Are you implying I should spend more time with my son? Sam's a grown man. If he wants to get a beer with me, he can tell me himself.$2
Entries.NPC.cs.3966: No, I am not going to leave my wife and young son to move in with you and Sam. Why would you even ask that?
Entries.NPC.cs.3967: ...Are you implying I should spend more time with my son? Sam's a grown man. If he wants to get a beer with me, he can tell me himself.$2
Entries.NPC.cs.3968: No, I am not going to leave my wife and young son to move in with you and Sam. Why would you even ask that?
Entries.Thu_inlaw_Sam: Hey, @. How are you and Sam doing?

Entries.Game1.cs.2782: What an awesome ceremony. Did you see how stoked Vincent was to be pendant-bearer?$h#$e#Well, time to kick back and relax!

Entries.Good_1: Do you ever think about that night you came to see the band perform? That's a really good memory for me.$l
Entries.Good_2: You know, I think I had a feeling we'd have a life together from the very beginning. There's just something special between us.$l
Entries.Good_3: You look great today. Did you do something with your hair?
Entries.Good_4: {{TermofEndearment}}, I was just gonna write you a song on the guitar. But now you're here and I feel relaxed.#$e#I mainly feel like playing guitar when I'm lonely.
Entries.Good_5: {{TermofEndearment}}, talk to me! I'm always interested to hear about your day.
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? You sure you don't want to skip it?#$e#Well, it's worth going if it makes you happy.
Entries.TwoKids_0: I woke up early, fed the kids and changed their diapers! We're all set. You can just focus on raking in that sweet money.$h#$e#I'm just kidding... I didn't move in with you for the money.

Entries.Good_1: Do you ever think about that night you came to see the band perform? That's a really good memory for me.$u
Entries.Good_2: You know, I think I had a feeling we'd have a life together from the very beginning. There's just something special between us.
Entries.Good_3: You look great today. Did you do something with your hair?
Entries.Good_4: {{TermofEndearment}}, I was just gonna write you a song on the guitar. But now you're here and I feel relaxed.#$e#I mainly feel like playing guitar when I'm lonely.
Entries.Good_5: {{TermofEndearment}}, talk to me! I'm always interested to hear about your day.

Entries.TwoKids_0: I woke up early, fed the kids and changed their diapers! We're all set. You can just focus on raking in that sweet money.$h#$e#I'm just kidding... I didn't move in with you for the money.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Do you think Sebastian and Abby will ever hook up?#$e#Sebastian is definitely into her, but I think she'd have to make the first move.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Hey. I know I joke around a lot, but I want you to know that you'll always be my best friend. I seriously love you, @.$l
Entries.Outdoor_4: Ha, you're all muddy. You're really selling the classic farmer look!$h
Entries.OneKid_3: I think we should adopt another kid. Vincent keeps asking when he gets to be a 'double uncle.'$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Do you think Sebastian and Abby will ever hook up?#$e#Sebastian is definitely into her, but I think she'd have to make the first move.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Hey. I know I joke around a lot, but I want you to know that you'll always be my best friend. I seriously love you, @.
Entries.Outdoor_4: Ha, you're all muddy. You're really selling the classic farmer look!$h
Entries.OneKid_3: I think we should adopt another kid. Vincent keeps asking when he gets to be a 'double uncle.'$h

Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Hey, you look tired. Let me help you relax tonight, okay? Can I get you anything?

Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, look what I made for you! [194 211]$h#$e#Sorry... I only know how to cook instant pancakes and eggs.$10#$e#But at least I learned my fried egg technique from a master!

Entries.Outdoor_Sam: Hey, look at those puffy clouds in the sky, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}!$h#$e#I'm going to watch those for a while, if you don't mind.
Entries.winter_Sam: I still care about music, but our household comes first. I don't want to put everything on you like I used to do with my mom.

Entries.Outdoor_Sam: Hey, look at those puffy clouds in the sky, {{TermofEndearment}}!$h#$e#I'm going to watch those for a while, if you don't mind.
Entries.winter_Sam: I still care about music, but our household comes first. I don't want to put everything on you like I used to do with my mom.

Entries.marriage_Fri.001: Sorry, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. I'm trying to concentrate here... $7
Sorry, {{TermofEndearment}}. I'm trying to concentrate here... $7

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Sam: I feel like I've changed a lot from when we first met... you know?#$b#...you might call it 'maturity'... hehe.$10#$b#But I'm at a place, now, where I'm actually really excited about our future together...$l#$b#Even if that means just doing normal stuff, like... uh... buying groceries and taking the trash out... hah...$10

I feel like I've changed a lot from when we first met... you know?#$b#...you might call it 'maturity'... hehe.$10#$b#But I'm at a place, now, where I'm actually really excited about our future together...#$b#Even if that means just doing normal stuff, like... uh... buying groceries and taking the trash out... hah...$10

Entries.Event.cs.1625: Aw, I gotta put on that dorky suit again?$8#$b#...Well, if you're double daring me, I have no choice.$n

Entries.samMessage: {{Lowercase:@}},^i need your help with something. meet me at my house sometime between 10 and 5? ^   -Sam[#]Sam's Note

Entries.233104/f Sam 2500/t 1000 1700/n samMessa: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 20 14 3 Sam 19 14 1 Jodi 6 13 0/skippable/viewport 18 14 true/viewport move 5 0 2000/pause 1000/speak Sam "Hey, @. Thanks for coming to talk with me in private."/faceDirection Sam 3/faceDirection sam 2/speak Sam "Mom should be heading out soon..."/pause 200/faceDirection Sam 1/pause 100/speak Sam "So the reason I asked you here is... I've been thinking about how much my mom does for me, and how much stress she's under.$7#$b#I don't think I help out as much as I should... Family should be there for each other, right?$s#$b#So I had an idea... I'm going to make her next birthday really special!#$b#I'm gonna clean the whole house, get her an extra-nice gift, and surprise her with breakfast in bed.$h#$b#I want it to be perfect, so I was hoping you could help me with a couple of things.#$b#First off, you're like, an expert on gift-giving... What do you think I should get for her?"/quickQuestion #Everyone loves pearls.#Jodi loves chocolate cake.#(Lie) Jodi loves spice berries.(break)speak Sam "Pearls?! Those are seriously hard to find!$8#$b#But that *would* be a really special gift... I'll ask Willy for tips on finding one."(break)speak Sam "That's a great idea! Especially for a birthday gift!#$b#I'm pretty sure I can make a cake from a box mix. How hard can it be?$10"(break)speak Sam "Come on, @, I'm looking for serious advice. Everyone knows my mom hates spice berries.$s#$b#...Oh, I think I get your point. It'll be more meaningful if I come up with something myself, right?"/move Jodi 0 2 1 true/emote Sam 32/pause 100/speak Sam "Thanks, @.#$b#So, the uh... The second thing I need help with is a little embarrassing...$10"/move Jodi 6 0 0/playSound woodyStep/faceDirection Sam 3/playSound woodyStep/showFrame Sam 33/jump Sam/pause 800/speak Jodi "Sam? Can I come in?"/move Sam -1 0 3/faceDirection Sam 1/speak Sam "Oh no! Don't say anything about the surprise!$8"/faceDirection Sam 3/speak Sam "Uh, sure, Mom! Come on in!"/doAction 12 14/faceDirection Sam 3 true/move Jodi 0 -2 1 false/move Jodi 2 0 1/speak Jodi "Hi, @.#$b#Sam, honey, did you want me to fix some snacks for you two?"/speak Sam "Thanks, but we're fine! I don't want to throw off your schedule.$h#$b#You were, um... planning to go out and run errands for the next one to three hours, right?$10"/emote Jodi 20/pause 300/speak Jodi "*giggle* Okay, I get the picture. I won't embarrass you in front of your friend.$h#$b#I'll see you tonight. Love you!"/speak Sam "Heh... Love you too, Mom.$10"/move Jodi -2 0 2/move Jodi 0 2 0/move Jodi -9 0 2 true/emote Sam 28/speak Sam "Whew... That was close. I don't think she caught on.#$b#It was really thoughtful of her to offer us snacks, right? I'm trying not to take that stuff for granted."/emote farmer 20/move Sam 1 0 1/speak Sam "So, the other part... The breakfast in bed...#$b#@... could you... teach me how to fry an egg?$10"/emote farmer 8/speak Sam "I never learned! Mom does all the cooking! I can't just serve her instant pancakes for her birthday... Please, @?$s"/pause 400/jump farmer/pause 800/speak Sam "I knew you'd come through for me! Let's head to the kitchen as soon as Mom leaves."/playMusic none/pause 1000/speak Sam "Hey, @? As long as I'm showing appreciation...$s"/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 500/speak Sam "It means a lot to me that you're helping me out. The truth is, I really look up to you.$l#$b#And not just because you can cook. Like, do you get how amazing your whole deal is? One day you just decided 'I'm a farmer now,' and you're already totally crushing it.$h#$b#What I mean is, I'm really glad we're friends, and I... I hope you feel the same way.$10"/pause 500/animate farmer true true 150 6 7 6 8/positionOffset farmer -2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 100/stopAnimation farmer/pause 800/animate farmer true true 100 101/pause 700/positionOffset Sam 6 0/showFrame Sam 38/pause 3000/playSound doorClose/pause 300/showFrame Sam 4/showFrame farmer 6/positionOffset farmer 2 0/positionOffset Sam -3 0/pause 30/positionOffset farmer 2 0/positionOffset Sam -3 0/pause 30/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 30/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 30/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 30/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 30/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 30/pause 200/speak Sam "She's gone! Okay, let's go break some eggs..."/move Sam -5 0 3 true/pause 50/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 2000/end dialogue Sam "I hope Mom doesn't notice how many eggs we went through.$h"

Entries.3918600/f Sam 3500/O Sam/t 610 1700/p Sa: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer 35 14 1 Sam 38 14 0/addConversationTopic samJob1 2/skippable/makeInvisible 37 14/makeInvisible 36 14/makeInvisible 35 14/viewport -100 -100 true unfreeze/pause 3000/emote Sam 28/pause 500/move farmer 2 0 1/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 400/speak Sam "Oh, hey @. You look like you've been working hard out there!"/pause 100/faceDirection Sam 0/emote Sam 40/pause 500/speak Sam "Hey, I was just thinking...$s#$b#You know, I really like living here with you. I mean... I love it!#$b#But, I feel like I've gotten really lazy. I just bum around aimlessly every day.$s"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Sam 3/speak Sam "Oh, I know you don't mind! You make enough money on the farm that I don't really need to work, and I really appreciate that!#$b#But I want to feel like I'm contributing to something... know what I mean?"/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 400/speak Sam "So... I think I'm gonna try to find some work... something to do with music.#$b#That's always been what I love the most!#$b#Oh, uh... besides my best friend, of course!$h#$b#Heh...$10"/faceDirection Sam 3/speak Sam "Anyway... I'll let you know how it goes!"/emote farmer 56/pause 500/end
Entries.3918601/e 3918600/O Sam/t 610 1700/A sam: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer 37 14 1 Sam 38 14 0/addConversationTopic samJob2 2/skippable/makeInvisible 37 14/animate Sam false true 400 43 51/viewport -100 -100 true unfreeze/pause 4000/stopAnimation Sam/showFrame Sam 39/pause 400/jump Sam/emote Sam 16/pause 500/speak Sam "Hey @, listen to this!$8"/pause 500/stopAnimation Sam/animate Sam false true 400 43 51/pause 500/speak Sam "'Dear Sam, we are pleased to offer you a position as 'junior composer' at Zuzu Broadcasting Group, TV division...'$6#$b#Wow! Music for a TV show! How cool is that?!$h"/pause 500/emote Sam 40/pause 1000/textAboveHead Sam "Oh..."/animate Sam false true 400 43 51/pause 1000/speak Sam "Oh... Hold on...$s#$b#... It's a TV show for little kids... 'The Happy Junimo Show'$s"/emote Sam 28/pause 1000/speak Sam "Not exactly what I had in mind...$s"/stopAnimation Sam/showFrame Sam 0/pause 300/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/quickQuestion #Just think of this as a stepping stone in your career...#Just think of how happy you'll make the children!#I'm sorry...(break)pause 100\speak Sam "Hmm... Yeah, I guess that's one way to look at it.$7"(break)pause 100\speak Sam "I mean... you're right, someone's gotta make children's music. But it's not exactly a 'dream job'...$7"(break)pause 100\speak Sam "Ah well... that's okay. I'll make the best of it, like I always do.$7"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 0/speak Sam "I guess I'd better start 'thinking like a kid'..."/quickQuestion #That should be easy for you...#You could ask your little brother for help!(break)animate Sam false true 100 33\shake Sam 4000\pause 500\textAboveHead Sam "Hey!"\faceDirection farmer 2 true\animate farmer false true 200 102 103(break)pause 100\speak Sam "Hmm... That's not a bad idea. At the very least, I could play him my songs and see if he likes them.#$b#Thanks for the advice, @."/pause 2000/end dialogue Sam "I'll be working on this for a few days."

Entries.summer_Mon10: Getting to play in Zuzu City was a dream come true, but I feel like I've gotten that out of my system.#$e#I kind of want to focus on my friendships in town for now.$l
Entries.summer_Tue10: Maybe I should learn how to cook more kinds of food.#$b#You wouldn't mind being my taste tester, right?$h
Entries.summer_Fri10: I've been writing a song lately.#$e#It's uh... it's about friendship.#$e#You're not gonna laugh at me, are you?$10
Entries.fall_Wed10: It's tough for me to focus on writing lyrics lately. I think some of my muse came from feeling isolated in this town.#$e#But that's not really an issue anymore.$l
Entries.winter_Tue8: Penny and I used to hang out a lot when we first moved here.#$e#We still hang out occasionally, and we've got this weird, almost... flirty? ...thing going.$10#$e#At least, sometimes it seems that way. But other times I feel like she still thinks of me as a kid.$s
Entries.winter_Wed10: Hey, you aren't hiring at your farm or anything, are you?$10
Entries.winter_Fri10: @! It's so good to see you! Give me a hug.#$e#Huh? 'Not normally a hugger'? I am when it's this cold!$h

Entries.summer_Mon10: Getting to play in Zuzu City was a dream come true, but I feel like I've gotten that out of my system.#$e#I kind of want to focus on my friendships in town for now.
Entries.summer_Tue10: Maybe I should learn how to cook more kinds of food.#$b#You wouldn't mind being my taste tester, right?$h
Entries.summer_Fri10: I've been writing a song lately.#$e#It's uh... it's about friendship.#$e#You're not gonna laugh at me, are you?$10
Entries.fall_Wed10: It's tough for me to focus on writing lyrics lately. I think some of my muse came from feeling isolated in this town.#$e#But that's not really an issue anymore.
Entries.winter_Tue8: Penny and I used to hang out a lot when we first moved here.#$e#We still hang out occasionally, and we've got this weird, almost... flirty? ...thing going.$10#$e#At least, sometimes it seems that way. But other times I feel like she still thinks of me as a kid.$s
Entries.winter_Wed10: Hey, you aren't hiring at your farm or anything, are you?$10
Entries.winter_Fri10: @! It's so good to see you! Give me a hug.#$e#Huh? 'Not normally a hugger'? I am when it's this cold!$h
Entries.fall_Mon10_1: You're the best, @. I can't wait for my dad to meet you when he gets back.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: #$c .5#Do you think Sebastian and Abigail will ever hook up? Sebastian is definitely into her, but I think she'd have to make the first move.#Sebastian's a few years older than me. I never expected I'd be the first of us to partner up with someone.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Earlier, I listened to our live recording from that show we played. Remember that? Man, was that sloppy.#$b#It made me a little nervous that you were there, I didn't want to mess up and have you think I was a loser!$10
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: #$c .5#Oh! 'Morning. Does my hair look okay today?#Hey. I know I joke around a lot, but I want you to know that you'll always be my best friend. I seriously love you, @.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: #$c .5#Hey, sorry I didn't clean up much today. You know I'm sloppy... that's why you like me, right?$h#Me? Oh, I got caught up on some shows today. I'm feelin' a bit stir crazy; they were kinda intense.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: #$c .5#Ready to hit the hay?#Want me to play you a guitar lullaby? I'm in no rush to fall asleep, myself, but you're probably pretty tired.
Entries.Outdoor_4: #$c .5#Ha, you're all muddy. You're really selling the classic farmer look!$h#Hoo... I was thinking I didn't sleep so well last night. But just stepping out here makes me feel awake all the sudden!
Entries.OneKid_3: #$c .5#I think we should adopt another kid. Vincent keeps asking when he gets to be a 'double uncle.'$h#Sure, being a dad is way more exhausting than I imagined, but I'm up for a challenge!$h
Entries.summer_12: It was nice seeing Penny at the festival yesterday. I don't see her as often these days.#$e#Plus, I don't think her and I dating is in the cards anymore, you know? She's looking for a long-term commitment, and I already have that with you.$l#$b#So there's less awkwardness hanging in the air between us now.$10
Entries.fall_9: I keep getting the sense that some people think we partnered up too young.$7#$b#Look, I get how they could think that, but I just want to let you know that for me, this is real.$s#$b#We can do this, right? I'm on board... you're on board...#$e#We're gonna conquer the world together.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: #$c .5#Do you think Sebastian and Abigail will ever hook up? Sebastian is definitely into her, but I think she'd have to make the first move.#Sebastian's a few years older than me. I never expected I'd be the first of us to partner up with someone.

She's looking for a long-term commitment, and I already have that with you.#$b#So there's less awkwardness hanging in the air between us now.$10

Entries.winter_14: If you're not as busy this season, is there a day that we can just spend lounging around? I really kinda miss you.

Entries.Indoor_Night_0: #$c .5#Hey, you look tired. Let me help you relax tonight, okay? Can I get you anything?#Whoa, you're home! Guess that's my cue. OK, relax-o time for you! [184 346 206]

Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, look what I made for you! [194 211]$h#$e#Sorry... I only know how to cook instant pancakes and eggs.$10#$e#But I'm an instant pancake connoisseur... and I learned my fried egg technique from a master!$h

Entries.Mon_inlaw_Sam: You and Sam becoming {{RelationshipLabel}} came as quite a surprise.#$e#Welcome to the family.
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Sam4: Hey. Maybe we should catch up at the saloon sometime.#$b#I'd like to pick your brain on how to connect with Sam... I think you know him better than I do at this point.$s
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Sam8: I'm glad to have you as part of the family, @. Jodi tells me you're a good influence on Sam.$h

Entries.winter_Wed_inlaw_Sam: So you and my brother love each other, but you're not 'in love?'$3#$e#That makes sense. I only wanna marry Miss Penny, but I love lots of other people.$h
Entries.Wed_inlaw_Sam: How's my brother doing?#$e#We're sort of related now, aren't we?$h

Changes.LogName: KO Mines- Sam, love portraits true

Entries.PlayerKilled: none/-100 -100/farmer 20 10 2 {{Spouse}} 19 10 1 Marlon 18 10 3/skippable/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{2}?"/pause 1000/message " {{TermofEndearment}}, wake up!"/viewport 19 10 true/pause 1500/speak {{Spouse}} "There you are! Easy there. Are you feeling okay?"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak {{Spouse}} "I was jamming to my favorite tune when suddenly, I felt like something had gone terribly wrong.#$b#I really felt like I had to check on you. Turns out I was right on the money.$2"/pause 1000/speak Marlon "And I simply came along to clear a path for Sam while we brought you back up to the surface.#$b#At first, I was to venture in alone, but he insisted on coming along.#$b#You're blessed to have ended up sharing your life with someone so courageous."/emote {{Spouse}} 16/pause 500/speak {{Spouse}} "You sure about that, pops? I really didn't end up doing much more than piggybacking @ back up here.$s#$b#I wouldn't go as far as to say I was 'courageous'...$10"/pause 1000/speak Marlon "It's in my nature to be frank. I'm simply stating the fact of what I saw. You did well, standing by my side."/pause 500/move Marlon 0 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Marlon 3/speak Marlon "At any rate, it's best to leave for now. @ needs to rest and recuperate. You two shouldn't linger."/pause 500/textAboveHead Marlon "Farewell."/move Marlon 0 4 0/warp Marlon -100 -100/pause 1500/speak {{Spouse}} "Hey, @... Not going to lie, the bad feeling put me on edge, especially when we couldn't find you fast.$2#$b#But I know that exploring the mines is your 'thing', so I won't ask you to stop going back.#$b#Besides, I know that skill isn't the issue with someone tough like you. I'll be rooting for you to have better luck next time!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 0/pause 500/minedeath/end dialogue {{Spouse}} "Hey @, good timing. I just finished picking up around the house so you can just kick back, take it easy, and rest up. You fought hard today.$l#$c 0.7#Sometimes, I still don't believe I'm sharing my life with someone like you. Cool, strong, and stubborn. It's part of your charm, though!$1#And because I'm an amazing {{SocialMenuLabel}}, I got you a snack you could refuel on while you relax. Enjoy![210 215 223 228 232 243 403 406 613 618 636 651]$1"

Entries.marriage_beach4: %Sam looks deep in thought.#$b#...$3#$b#@! Oh wow, I was just thinking about you! Good to see you.$h
Entries.marriage_b4: Look, Vincent, it's {{Auncle}} @!#$b#Hey, now both of my favorite people are here!$h
Entries.marriage_b5: Hey, come here and give me a hug.#$b#Don't look at me like that, Vincent. You hug your friends too.$10
Entries.marriage_b8a: Hey, good to see you, always.#$b#{{Random: Stick around for awhile., Though I think Vincent is more excited than me. It's blowing his mind that you're basically family now.$h}}
Entries.marriage_fallb2: %Sam smiles at you, but doesn't try to fill the silence. He seems content just to enjoy your company.
Entries.marriage_fallb5a: %Sam looks deep in thought.#$b#Hey, don't worry about me. I'm just thinking about {{Random: food., how happy I've been since I moved in with you.$l}}$3
Entries.marriage_guitar6: Feels just like old times!$h#$b#Time flies, huh? Still can't believe we're {{RelationshipLabel}}.
Entries.marriage_SatA: I was just thinking... Remember that time you taught me to fry an egg?#$b#I can't believe you didn't get sick from eating all the ones I messed up. You really have an iron stomach, huh?$h#$b#If you're ever REALLY hungry, maybe we could tackle pizza next.$10
Entries.marriage_SatA2: Where's Sebastian? I knew I should've brought a comic with me...$7#$b#Mind keeping me company until he gets here?
Entries.marriage_SatA5: Give me your thoughts on these lyrics. I had you in mind writing it. What do you think?$6#$b#%Sam shows you his lyrics. At least it's not another sappy friendship song.#$b#Sweet. I hope Sebastian doesn't mind.
Entries.marriage_SatA6: I know I can sound careless at times... So I want you to know that you're still my best friend and I don't ever take that for granted. I seriously love you, @.$l
Entries.marriage_vincent2: Oh, hi @. Vincent was just talking about you. He tells me you're the coolest grown-up in town.#$b#What about me, sport? Did you forget about me?$h#$b#Although he's not wrong...$l
Entries.marriage_doctorafter: I had a real good game going while I was waiting.#$b#Huh?#$b#Oh, yeah. Dr. Harvey said everything looks fine so you don't have to worry about a thing.$h#$b#See you back home soon.
Entries.marriage_nm: Hey, take this.#$b#%Sam drapes a jacket over your shoulders.#$b#It's chilly tonight. I know you can handle it, but I've got your back so you don't have to.$u
Entries.marriage_16: Oh, you got some mud on your face. Lemme get that for you.#$b#There you go. You're going to turn heads here, you know. You're sort of like a mini celebrity.$h

Entries.marriage_gm: Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. I'd co-op with you if I had another one of these.#$b#Sorry!$h
Hi, {{TermofEndearment}}. I'd co-op with you if I had another one of these.#$b#Sorry!$h

Entries.marriage_w: Hey, what're you doing here? Surely not visiting me, right?#$b#Thanks, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.$h
Entries.marriage_w4: Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}! I was just admiring all these gems and fossils on display.#$b#Gunther told me you collected them all by yourself!$h

Entries.marriage_w: Hey, what're you doing here? Surely not visiting me, right?#$b#Thanks, {{TermofEndearment}}.$h
Entries.marriage_w4: Hi, {{TermofEndearment}}! I was just admiring all these gems and fossils on display.#$b#Gunther told me you collected them all by yourself!$h
We shouldn't be talking, Morris has the eyes of a hawk. I miss you, I'll see you after.
